notifications.voiceCallsDesc: Samu sanarwa don kiran murya masu shigowa
notifications.emergencyAlertsDesc: Kullum sanar lokacin yanayi na gaggawa

locationServices.title: Location Services

chats.title: Zama na Tattaunawa Masu Aiki
chats.subtitle: Sarrafa da amsa bukatun taimakon masu amfani
chats.selectChatDesc: Zaɓi tattaunawa daga jerin don fara amsa saƙonnin masu amfani
chats.chatNotFoundDesc: Zaman tattaunawa da ake nema bai wanzu ba ko kuwa ba ku da damar shiga.
chats.unknownUser: Mai amfani da ba a sani ba

login.title: Barka da Komawa
login.subtitle: Don Allah ka shiga asusunka
login.orContinueWith: Ko kuma ka ci gaba da
login.anonymousSos: Taimakon gaggawa ba tare da shiga ba

signup.title: Bude Asusu
signup.subtitle: Kasance tare da Hopeline yau
signup.redirecting: Ana tura ka zuwa banganen dashboard...

findShelter.title: Nemo Sansanin IDP & Gidajen Gaggawa
findShelter.subtitle: Nemo sansanonin IDP na hukuma da wuraren zama a Bayelsa da Adamawa tare da akwai fili da ayyuka.
findShelter.searchPlaceholder: Nemi sunan sansani, ƙungiya, ko jiha...
findShelter.useCurrentLocation: Yi amfani da wurin da kake a yanzu
findShelter.clickToFind: Danna maballin da ke sama don nemo wurinka.
findShelter.noSheltersFound: Ba a sami Wuraren Zama ba
findShelter.locationNeededDesc: Don Allah danna 'Yi amfani da wurin da kake a yanzu' don samun kwata.
findShelter.geolocationNotSupportedDesc: Burauzarka ba ta goyan bayan geolocation.
findShelter.fetchError: An kasa loda bayanan wurin zama.
findShelter.unknownCity: Birnin da ba a sani ba
findShelter.unknownState: Jihar da ba a sani ba
findShelter.unknownCountry: Ƙasar da ba a sani ba

sos.title: SOS na Gaggawa
sos.subtitle: Aika sanarwar gaggawa nan take ga CARITAS Nigeria, 'Yan sanda, da masu bada agajin gaggawa na gida.
sos.immediateEmergency: Gaggawar da ke barazana ga rayuwa?
sos.clickToInstruction: Danna maballin da ke ƙasa don aika SOS nan take tare da wurinka.
sos.emergencyTypeSelect: Zaɓi nau'in gaggawa don taimakawa masu bada agaji su shirya taimakon da ya dace
sos.additionalInfoDesc: Ba da duk wani ƙarin bayani don taimakawa masu bada agaji su fahimci halin da kake ciki
sos.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Misali, Adadin mutanen da abin ya shafa, bukatun magani, sanannen wuri (landmark)...
sos.locationDesc: Muna buƙatar coordinates ɗinka don aika masu bada agaji
sos.locationAccessRequiredDesc: Don Allah ka bar izinin shiga wurinka don gano matsayinka ta atomatik. Duba burauzarka ko saitin na'urarka.
sos.troubleshootDesc: Idan kana samun kuskuren 'kCLErrorLocationUnknown' ko matsaloli na dindindin:
sos.troubleshootStep1_1: Je zuwa System Settings → Privacy & Security → Location Services.
sos.troubleshootStep1_2: Tabbatar cewa Location Services yana Kunnawa (ON).
sos.troubleshootStep1_3: Tabbatar cewa an kunna Google Chrome.
sos.troubleshootStep2Desc: Kashe Wi-Fi da sake kunna shi na iya taimakawa wajen sabunta wuri.
sos.troubleshootStep3: 3. Yi amfani da Saka Wuri da Hannu
sos.troubleshootStep3Desc: Idan GPS ya ci gaba da kasawa, don Allah yi amfani da zaɓin 'Saka Wuri da Hannu'.
sos.specificAddressPlaceholder: Don Allah ka ba da takamaiman bayanin inda kake a yanzu don taimakawa masu bada agaji su same ka.
sos.noInternetUssd: Babu Yanar Gizo? Yi amfani da USSD
sos.worksOnNetworks: Yana aiki akan MTN, Airtel, Glo, 9mobile
sos.ussdCodesNotAvailable: Lambobin USSD babu su don wurinka.
sos.nextStep1: An aika sanarwarku ga CARITAS da masu bada agajin gaggawa na gida.
sos.nextStep2: Tawagar taimakonmu za ta yi ƙoƙarin tuntuɓar ku nan take.
sos.nextStep3: An tura masu bada agaji zuwa wurin da kake na GPS.
sos.nextStep4: Don Allah ka bar layinka a buɗe kuma ka zauna a wuri mai aminci.
sos.locationPermissionDenied: An hana izinin shiga wuri. Don Allah kunna izinin wuri.
sos.locationUnavailable: Bayanin wuri ba shi da kyauta.
sos.locationRequiredDesc: Don Allah ka bar izinin shiga wuri ko saka adireshinka kafin aika SOS.
sos.detailsRequiredDesc: Don Allah ka ba da jiha da adireshi don saka wuri da hannu.
sos.sosSentDesc: An sanar da masu bada agaji game da halin da kake ciki.
sos.sosFailedDesc: An kasa aika sanarwar SOS. Don Allah gwada lambobin USSD.

profile.title: Bayanan Ka
profile.subtitle: Sarrafa bayanan ka na asali da abubuwan da ka fi so
profile.personalInfoDesc: Sabunta bayanan ka da hoton ka
profile.authRequiredDesc: Dole ne ka shiga asusunka don duba bayanan ka.
profile.profileCompleteDesc: Bayanan ka na yau da kullum kuma ya kammala

assistance.subtitle: Haɗa da mutanenmu ta hanyar tattaunawa ko kiran waya don taimako nan take
assistance.whatKindDesc: Zaɓi irin taimakon don samun sauri

psychological.title: Taimakon Hankali
psychological.desc: Lafiyar kwakwalwa da shawarwarin tashin hankali

transportation.title: Sufuri
transportation.desc: Sufuri mai aminci zuwa gidaje ko asibiti

shelter.title: Taimakon Gida
shelter.desc: Taimako don samun gida mai lafiya

food.title: Abinci & Ruwa
food.desc: Rarraba abinci na gaggawa da ruwa mai tsabta

medical.title: Taimakon Likita
medical.desc: Kula da gaggawa na likita da lafiya

chat.connectTitle: Haɗa Ku Tare da Mutane A Jiharka
chat.connectDesc: Tattaunawa da ma'aikata, masu amfani ko shugabanni a {{state}}
chat.noAgentsMatch: Babu ma'aikatan taimako da suka dace da "{{search}}"
chat.noAgentsAvailable: Babu Ma'aikatan Taimako da ke Akwai
chat.offlineAgents: Duk ma'aikatan taimako a {{state}} suna ban layi. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
chat.noAdminsMatch: Babu shugabanni da suka dace da "{{search}}"
chat.noAdminsFound: Ba a sami shugabanni a {{state}} ba.

errors.couldNotJoin: Ba a iya shiga kungiyar ba
errors.couldNotDetermine: Ba a iya gane kungiyar al'ummarku ba
errors.notParticipant: Kai ba memba ba ne na wannan tattaunawar.

call.voiceVideoDesc: Ma'aikatanmu suna shirye su taimaka muku ta murya ko bidiyo.
call.selectAgentFirst: Don Allah ka zaɓi ma'aikaci daga sashin tattaunawa don fara kira.
call.recentCalls: Kiran ka na kwanan nan tare da ma'aikata

footer.contactAuthorities: Tuntuɓi hukumomi nan take inda ake buƙata

navigate.title: Kewaya Hanya
navigate.subtitle: Sami kwatancen hanya mai aminci don gidaje masu gaggawa a Bayelsa da Adamawa
navigate.chooseDestinationDesc: Zaɓi wurin zama ko shigar da adireshinka na keɓe
navigate.couldNotDetermineLocation: Ba a iya tantance wuri ba. Don Allah kunna ayyukan wuri.
navigate.safeRoutesDesc: Tsaya a kan hanyoyin da ke da amintattu gwargwadon iko
navigate.shareLocationDesc: Raba hanyarka tare da asusukan gaggawa
navigate.emergencyReadyDesc: Idan kana jin rashin lafiya, yi amfani da yanayin gaggawa SOS nan take

toasts.fetchShelterError: Ba a iya fitar da bayanan gida ba.
toasts.couldNotDetermineAddress: Ba a iya gane adireshi ba
toasts.getLocationFirst: Don Allah ka sami wurinka na yanzu tukunna.
toasts.selectDestination: Don Allah zaɓi gida ko shigar da wuri.
toasts.safeRoutesToastDesc: Yi amfani da mai gano hanya don samun hanya mai lafiya.

weather.title: Faɗakarwar Yanayi
weather.mobileUsersHint: Masu Amfani da Waya: Bada damar wuri a Saituna → Sirri → Sabis na Wuri.
weather.enterLocationDesc: Saka coordinates ko sunan jama'a don samun yanayi.
weather.couldNotLoad: Ba a iya loda bayanin yanayi ba.
weather.impactDesc: Binciken AI game da yadda yanayi zai iya cutar gida da tsaro.
weather.ussdDesc: Nemi bayanan yanayi ba tare da intanet ba a kan karamin waya

errors.title: Kuskure
errors.fetchFailed: Ba a iya ɗaukar bayanan yanayi ba.
errors.httpsRequiredDesc: Sabis na wurin yana buƙatar HTTPS.
errors.geoNotSupportedDesc: Wurin ba a tallafawa don amfani ka ba.
errors.permissionDenied: An hana izinin wuri. Don Allah ka kunna.
errors.positionUnavailable: Bayanin wuri ba shi da tallafi.
errors.timeout: Lokaci ya ƙure don karɓar damar wuri.
errors.noLocationDesc: Don Allah kunna wuri ko saka suna garinku.

tips.title: Shawarwarin Tsaro
tips.impactDesc: Binciken AI game da yadda yanayi zai cutar gida da tsaro.

toasts.locationRequired: Ana buƙatar damar wurin don yanayi.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Tsarin taimakon gaggawa don nemo wurin zama, samun taimako, da kiyaye lafiya a yankunan da bala'i ya shafa. Wani aiki da Gidauniyar CITI ke tallafawa.
dashboard.ussdSubtitle: Kira waɗannan lambobin don taimako ba tare da yanar gizo ba
dashboard.emergencyContactsSubtitle: Layi kai tsaye zuwa ga masu bada agajin gaggawa na gida

migration.registeredLocation: Wurin da aka yi rajista a halin yanzu
migration.shelterAssignmentDesc: Ana duba bayanan ku a halin yanzu don keɓe wurin zama. Za mu sanar da ku idan an keɓe muku wuri.

privacy.title: Manufar Sirri
privacy.introduction: Sirrinku yana da mahimmanci a gare mu. Wannan Manufar Sirri tana bayyana yadda CARITAS HopeLine ke tattarawa, amfani, da kare bayananku.

collection.title: Tattara Bayani
collection.description: Muna tattara bayanan da kuke bayarwa kai tsaye gare mu, kamar sunanku, lambar waya, da wurin da kuke lokacin da kuka yi rajista ko neman taimako.

usage.title: Yadda Muke Amfani da Bayani
usage.description: Ana amfani da bayanan don daidaita martanin gaggawa, keɓance wuraren zama a sansanonin IDP, da inganta ayyukanmu na jinkai.

sharing.title: Raba Bayani
sharing.description: Muna raba bayananku kawai da masu ba da agajin gaggawa masu izini, manajojin rukunin gine-gine, da abokan hulɗa na jinkai da ke cikin taimakonku.

rights.title: Haƙƙoƙinku
rights.description: Kuna da haƙƙin samun dama, gyarawa, ko neman goge bayanan ku na sirri a kowane lokaci ta hanyar saitunan bayanan ku.

contact.title: Tuntuɓe Mu
contact.description: Idan kuna da tambayoyi game da wannan manufar, tuntuɓi ƙungiyar tallafawa ta hanyar tattaunawa ta kai tsaye ko hanyoyin gaggawa.

privacy.consent: Ta amfani da HopeLine, kun yarda da sharuɗɗan wannan Manufar Sirri da sadaukarwarmu don kare bayananku yayin rikice-rikice na jinkai.

deleteAccount.title: Goge Akanta
deleteAccount.subtitle: Nemi goge akanta da bayanai
deleteAccount.warning: Gargaɗi: Wannan aikin na dindindin ne. Da zarar an goge akantarka, duk bayananka, gami da tarihi, bayanan sirri, da saituna, za a cire su na dindindin kuma ba za a iya dawo da su ba.
deleteAccount.reasonPlaceholder: Da fatan za a gaya mana dalilin da yasa kake son goge akantarka...
deleteAccount.confirmCheckbox: Na fahimci cewa wannan aikin ba za a iya sauyawa ba kuma duk bayanana za su bace.
deleteAccount.successMessage: An karɓi buƙatarka ta goge akanta da bayanai. Tawagar mu za ta aiwatar da ita cikin kwanaki 30 daidai da manufofin mu na sirri.
deleteAccount.errorMessage: An sami kuskure wajen gabatar da buƙatarka. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa daga baya ko tuntuɓi tallafi kai tsaye.
